title: Sound On: VA Rep. Riggleman, Obama and 2020, Protests
itunes:title: Sound On: VA Rep. Riggleman, Obama and 2020, Protests
description:
Guests: Jordan Fabian, Bloomberg White House reporter, Matt Gorman, Vice President at Targeted Victory & Former NRCC Communications Director, Congressman Denver Riggleman, a Republican representing Virginia's 5th Congressional district, and David Tafuri, Former Obama Campaign Foreign Policy Adviser.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
